name: We Are Not UN
description:
WHAT IS WeAreNotUN ?

To hell with the United Nations and other NATO of evil! In WE ARE NOT UN, the player creates his own international organization. Soon, different countries of the world come to join his cause and sit in his organization. Conflict resolution, mediation, health and economic management, emergency responses and sending international aid in case of natural disasters... these are all decisions that the player will have to make. However, the player will soon realize that the more countries in his organization, the more difficult it is to keep everyone happy! Will you manage to keep control of your organization until the end of your mandate?

GAMEPLAY

In WE ARE NOT ONE, the player must make choices in the face of events facing the world, taking into account the financial means of his organization as well as the cost of an action, but also the mood of the member countries, who are the only financiers of  the organization! And of course, with the decrease of its mood, a country will certainly lower its contribution...!

TEAM MEMBERS

BERRY Oscar / CAUCHOIS Lilian / LEDUFF Yannick / REGUIGA Alexandre / SCHELL-WACK Matéo / VAUDAINE Lucas
